intro: Armeriastrum cataonicum, commonly known as the Catawba sandverbena, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. Its leaves are narrow and covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss in sandy, well-drained soils. Armeriastrum cataonicum is often found in open, disturbed habitats like roadsides and sandy fields.
